name: Locastic
description:
Locastic is a digital agency that provides a full-service approach to all phases of software development - from the idea and design through the implementation, testing and putting applications in production.
We offer all sorts of digital development services, variating from fantastic and creative UI/UX design, up to the precise and prompt web and mobile development, using tools like Symfony, Drupal 8, Angular, React, Javascript, HTML/CSS and more.
Our successful projects are the result of listening to our client wishes, recognizing their needs and understanding the market. The main goal at Locastic is profitable, sustainable and enjoyable long-term relationships with employees and customers.
Make sure you check out our company profile for some more detailed info.
